name: Personal Pandora Generator
body:
Welcome to the Personal-Pandora-Generator homepage! Right now I'm just using it to publicly show what changes have been made, but this will probably be expanded to include more in the future.

# Character Creation Tool
## For V0.3.1
### May 16, 2012
* Made the Character Creation Tool's possibilities no longer hard-coded and changed the way that it is done.

### May 15, 2012
* Separated dictionaries into separate text files and spell-checked.
* Updated naming conventions.

#  Character Creation
## For V0.4.0
### May 15, 2012
* Removed deleted files.
* Updated naming conventions.

### Oct 15, 2011
* A bunch of bug fixes and the introduction of types.

### Oct 04, 2011
* Finished adding in all the skills and some basic modifications to the system.

### Sep 24, 2011
* Increased the efficiency of the code and added more skills.

### Sep 17, 2011
* Initial Commit
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
